BR.name: Citizens of Earth
BR.description: Acabas de ser eleito Vice-Presidente do Mundo... E agora? Recruta os amigos, familiares e habitantes para a festa e para a luta! Neste jogo retro de RPG actual, acabas de regressar de umas férias patrocinadas pelo dinheiro dos contribuintes... e descobres que está tudo louco! Só TU tens o carisma necessário para delegar o trabalho sujo para salvar o mundo. Não te perguntes o que é que podes fazer pelos teus concidadãos... Pergunta-te o que é que os teus concidadãos podem fazer por ti!

CA.name: Citizens of Earth
CA.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! In this modern-day retro-RPG, you have returned home from the campaign trails for a little taxpayer-funded vacation... to find things have gone mad! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!

MX.name: Citizens of Earth
MX.description: Acaban de proclamarte vicepresidente del mundo... Y ahora, ¿qué? ¡Recluta a tus amigos, a tu familia y a toda la gente del pueblo para que se unan a tu equipo y luchen en tus batallas! En este RPG retro pero a la vez moderno, regresas a casa tras la travesía electoral para disfrutar de unas pequeñas vacaciones pagadas por los contribuyentes... ¡para encontrarte que todo está patas arriba! Solo TÚ posees el carisma necesario para delegar todo el trabajo sucio y salvar el mundo. Así que no preguntes qué puedes hacer por tus compatriotas... ¡Pregunta qué pueden hacer tus compatriotas por ti!

US.name: Citizens of Earth
US.description: You've just been elected as Vice President of the World... So what now? Recruit your friends, your family, and everyone else around town to join your party and fight your battles! In this modern-day retro-RPG, you have returned home from the campaign trails for a little taxpayer-funded vacation... to find things have gone mad! Only YOU have the charisma it takes to delegate all the dirty work and save the world. So don't ask what you can do for your countrymen...Ask what your countrymen can do for you!
